title: M8SBC-86 is an FPGA-Based “Kinda PC Compatible” 486
full_text: M8SBC-86 is an FPGA-Based “Kinda PC Compatible” 486. Given the technical specs of the FPGAs available to hobbyists these days, it really shouldn’t be a shock that you can implement a 486 core on one. In spite of knowing that in the technical se….
